strings:
Swiss-Army-Knife Addon http://code.google.com/p/swiss-army-knife
Script Devices Default DVD device Default Bluray device Used directorys Default ISO rip directory Default DVD transcode h264 directory Default Bluray MKV directory Various settings Default SSH command Default 1. audio language (DVD) Default 2. audio language (DVD) Default transcoding (DVD) Enable Bluray functions Enable network ripping functions Enable transcode & burning functions Password protect Expert Mode Password Default size single layer DVD Default netcat start-port (6 tcp ports) Verbose debug Default subtitle (DVD) Enable customer shell scripts Default vobcopy directory Default master network directory Default timeout 1: state file Default timeout 2: chapter DVD Default timeout 3: chapter Bluray Default burning transcode directory Default iPhone transcode directory Default PSP transcode directory Delete all files if processing fails Eject inserted medium if job successfull Use ISO Files instead of device Always use default directorys to store Disable copy protected dvd's from main menu Disable checking for Makemkv licence Enable notifications
Mainmenu Swiss-Army-Knife Job-Window Mainmenu Expert Mode Mainmenu Network Mainmenu User Functions Mainmenu Transcode & Burning
Transcode BluRay to MKV Transcode DVD Expert Mode Job Control Exit
Transcode Bluray to MKV (confirmed) Transcode DVD high-profile (confirmed) Ripp DVD to ISO (confirmed) Rescue-copy DVD to ISO (confirmed) Copy vob-files from DVD to hd (confirmed) Transcode & Burning Network functions User scripts Test SSH connection Info Back
Start Master Start Slave [DVD to master] Start Slave [Bluray to master] Reserved Back IP Address of the Master
transcode bluray to mkv copy subtitle transcoding pass 1 transcoding pass 2 copy dvd to iso-file resque-copy dvd to iso-file copy all vobs to harddisk copy from slave copy to master transcode dvd to mkv transcoding pass 1/1 for mp4
Progress bar Kill job Remove lock file Back Stage :
There are no active jobs
DVD -> ISO for burning DVD -> MKV DVD -> h264 low-profile DVD -> iPhone DVD -> PSP Back
Back
info-box Please select Bluray track to export Bluray transcoding started successfully Bluray transcoding could not be started This feature will be available in a later release of this addon Job cancelled by user Please select DVD track to export DVD transcoding started successfully DVD transcoding could not be started DVD iso copy started successfully DVD iso copy could not be started Please enter password for Expert Mode The password was not correct INFO: WARNING: ERROR:
ssh-test connection was successfull ssh-test connection failed Please select directory to save Directory name contains spaces Selected direcory is not writeable Export name without extension Export name contains invalid characters You must confirm a name Please select primary audio language Would you like to add a second audio language ? Would you like to use subtitles ? Please select secoundary audio language Please select subtitle track to use DVD vobcopy started successfully DVD vobcopy could not be started Active Job finished successfully Please insert an empty single layer DVD disk Please insert an empty dual layer DVD disk This menu will appear only if user functions have been defined Transcoding protected DVD's from main menu is disabled by configuration Job finished successfully No active job on startup found Active job on startup found Active job on exit found Exit Job ended with error Clean-up
You must run setup.sh prior to starting this addon for the first time Inserted disc is not a Bluray disc Timeout t1 to short : media/state could not be opened Bluray functions are disabled. Timeout t3 to short : Bluray chapters ISO directory not found or writeable ! DVD directory not found or writeable ! Bluray directory not found or writeable ! Device is locked by an active job ! Device is not ready ! Job could not be killed Inserted disc is not a DVD disc Timeout t2 to short : chapters dvd Problem with generated audio tracklist Problem with generated subtitle tracklist Licence key for Makemkv expired Configured SSH user is not current user The inserted DVD is not mounted Vobcopy directory not found or writeable ! Network master directory not found or writeable ! Network functions are disabled. Local SSH server is not configured properly User functions are disabled Error inside the active job -- Burning and Transcode functions are disabled Burning and Transcode directory not found or writeable ! Run setup.sh to create SSH directory ! This trancoding features needs Makemkv ! No connection to network master possible ! No connection fromm a client was made ! iPhone directory not found or writeable ! PSP directory not found or writeable ! Default mkv needs Bluray functions Copy protection detected. Process anyway ?
